definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Thev artist does all the active work, makes the biggest emotional investment.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家独揽了所有的创造性工作，投入了大量的心血。

sentences.english: The negative tendencies that accompany any creative project are strong.
sentences.chinese: 伴随任何创造性项目的负面趋势都是强烈的。

sentences.english: GFP has also been used for more, um, creative purposes.
sentences.chinese: 绿色荧光蛋白还具有更富创造性的用途。

sentences.english: Noma wrote, "It fosters one's mind to be creative and innovative."
sentences.chinese: 野间说，“这是促进人的心灵得到创造性和创新性。”

sentences.english: Yet Los Angeles receives only grudging recognition as a creative center.
sentences.chinese: 然而，洛城作为创造性的中心仅得到一些勉强的认同。

sentences.english: Many of his poems are the re-creation of some Chinese classical verses based on translation.
sentences.chinese: 他的很多诗作都是对中国古典诗歌的创造性重构。

sentences.english: "The gooey gentleman"is a work of creativity and one of my favorites.
sentences.chinese: 蜜糖先生》非常有创造性，是我最喜欢的作品之一。

sentences.english: The woman who bakes bread in the kitchen is said to be creative.
sentences.chinese: 在厨房烤面包的女人可以被称作是有创造性的。

sentences.english: It's also during rest that the right hemisphere becomes more dominant, which can lead to creative breakthroughs.
sentences.chinese: 休息时大脑右半球起支配作用，会带来创造性的突破。

sentences.english: What words can you find and use creatively?
sentences.chinese: 你能找到并创造性地使用哪些词呢？

sentences.english: The right side of the brain is known as the creative side.
sentences.chinese: 大脑右半球被称为富有创造性的半球。

sentences.english: You need to think creatively— outside the box .
sentences.chinese: 你应该跳出惯有思维方式，去创造性地思考。

sentences.english: The key is to get creative and think beyond traditional signage.
sentences.chinese: 关键是要获得创造性和超越传统的标识牌。

sentences.english: Goals can give creative people a much-needed sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 目标能膈腧富有创造性的人群必要的方向引导。

sentences.english: A complex creative intelligence with nothing to do is not just redundant.
sentences.chinese: 一个无所事事的复杂的创造性智慧不仅仅是多余的。

definition: innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to invent and innovate/inventions and innovations
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
